summary: Iteration 12 - Frontend testing of Calendar drag-and-drop, Public Booking Page redesign, Support Page with emoji picker, and Admin Panel Support Inbox. All features working correctly.
passed_tests: Calendar Day view - Team member columns with avatars displayed
Calendar Day view - Time grid (08:00-19:00) with 120 drop zones
Calendar Day view - Day/Week/Month tabs functional
Calendar Week view - 7 day columns displayed (Mon-Sun)
Calendar Week view - Booking cards are draggable (cursor: grab)
Calendar Week view - 'Drop here' placeholders in empty columns
Calendar Week view - 5 draggable booking cards found
Calendar Week view - Booking counts per day displayed
Public Booking Page - Services grid with 4 services (Haircut, Beard, Color, Conditioning)
Public Booking Page - Service selection with checkmark indicator
Public Booking Page - Staff selection (Any available + team members)
Public Booking Page - Bottom bar shows service count, duration, and price
Public Booking Page - 'Select Date & Time' button opens modal
Public Booking Page - Date/Time modal with week navigation
Public Booking Page - Morning/Afternoon/Evening time filters
Public Booking Page - Time slots (9:00 AM, 9:15 AM, etc.)
Public Booking Page - Service summary and total with tax
Public Booking Page - 'Add another service' option
Support Page - Messages list with existing conversations
Support Page - Chat view with message thread
Support Page - Message input with placeholder
Support Page - Emoji picker button (smile icon)
Support Page - Emoji-mart component with full emoji grid
Support Page - Emoji categories (Smileys, Animals, Food, etc.)
Support Page - Send button (paper plane icon)
Support Page - Attachment buttons (image, paperclip)
Admin Panel - Support Inbox tab visible in sidebar
Admin Panel - Support Inbox tab clickable and functional
Admin Panel - Support Conversations panel displayed
Admin Panel - Message view panel with 'Select a Conversation' prompt
critical_code_review_comments: Calendar drag-and-drop infrastructure is in place with draggable bookings and drop zones
Public Booking Page has premium redesign with services grid, staff selection, and date/time modal
Support Page has emoji-mart integration working correctly
Admin Panel Support Inbox tab is now visible and functional
context_for_next_testing_agent: All iteration 12 features verified working: 1) Calendar Week view has drag-and-drop with 'Drop here' placeholders and draggable booking cards. 2) Calendar Day view has team member columns with time grid drop zones. 3) Public Booking Page at /book/{businessId} has services grid, staff selection, and date/time modal with time filters. 4) Support Page has emoji-mart picker with full emoji categories. 5) Admin Panel Support Inbox tab is visible and clickable in sidebar. Test credentials: testuser@example.com / password123. Business ID: 3edbbbc1-730a-494e-9626-1a0a5e6309ef

week_view.drop_zones: 'Drop here' placeholders in empty day columns
week_view.booking_cards: Colored cards with time, client name, service

day_view.team_columns: Sarah Johnson, Michael Chen, Emma Wilson, etc.
